name: Smash and Crab
description:
Note: Game development is still in progress, with more functionality on the way!

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Q & E - Grab/drop objects
Left/right click - Interact with help items
(For now click and then drop to throw non-weapon objects)

Description:

Play as a crab on the lam in this game inspired by the works of Saul Bass!
Grab things with your crab hands.
Commit violence.
Make money.

Credits:

Made by LordVladTheRad and The_Creator#1000

Music:

Fast Talkin by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3740-fast-talkin
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Rollin at 5 by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5000-rollin-at-5
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Made for Brackey's 2021.2 Game Jam
